analysis.description:
ShibbolethToken.ShibbolethToken (/unique_chucks/38/0x2d915c3e78767b123bf56ab2daa49f74bb97904c.sol#139-149) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-rr.claimWithResolver(this,this) (/unique_chucks/38/0x2d915c3e78767b123bf56ab2daa49f74bb97904c.sol#148)

	External calls:
	- rr = ReverseRegistrar(ens.owner(0x91d1777781884d03a6757a803996e38de2a42967fb37eeaca72729271025a9e2)) (/unique_chucks/38/0x2d915c3e78767b123bf56ab2daa49f74bb97904c.sol#215-217)

	State variables written after the call(s):

Reentrancy in ShibbolethTokenFactory.create (/unique_chucks/38/0x2d915c3e78767b123bf56ab2daa49f74bb97904c.sol#220-235):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(ens.owner(subnode) == 0) (/unique_chucks/38/0x2d915c3e78767b123bf56ab2daa49f74bb97904c.sol#226-229)

	- ens.setResolver(subnode,this) (/unique_chucks/38/0x2d915c3e78767b123bf56ab2daa49f74bb97904c.sol#230-231)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/38/0x2d915c3e78767b123bf56ab2daa49f74bb97904c.sol#223-224:
